title: Dropform
subtitle: The form solution for any developer.
description: Form backend handling is not meant to be difficult.99% of website use some kind of forms e.g contact, survey etc, so you need backend architecture to collect submissions, receive emails and automate responses. Using dropform you don't have worry about how to handle forms on your website. Use our api and we'll do the rest. This gives you flexilibity to design your forms however you want without worrying how to handle it on backend.

title: Vocall
subtitle: Enable your website to talk.
description: With Vocall you can easily embed voice notes onto your website. Engage with your users in a much more personal way, provide content summaries, extra information - using your OWN voice!. Within few minutes you can create widget for your website using vocall.

title: Alertific
subtitle: App review & ratings tools to level up your whole customer experience
description: Alertific is simple tool, just select the app you want to monitor its reviews, enter email and that's it. It will send you daily alerts of new app reviews. Its simple and does not require any registration.
